data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Grand Turk, Turks and Caicos Islands from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Grand Turk, Turks and Caicos Islands
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Grand Turk to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, move the 1,566 believers in the state of Grand Turk to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Grand Turk.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cockburn Town
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cockburn Town, Grand Turk, Turks and Caicos Islands.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 4,900 people living in Grand Turk.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Grand Turk
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.focus_label: Grand Turk, Turks and Caicos Islands

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Grand Turk, Turks and Caicos Islands to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

location.name: Grand Turk
location.full_name: Grand Turk, Turks and Caicos Islands
